snippet: The spooked animal bolted near Columbus Circle, dumped its driver and toppled its carriage containing passengers, running into two cars. The horse escaped serious injury.
abstract: The spooked animal bolted near Columbus Circle, dumped its driver and toppled its carriage containing passengers, running into two cars. The horse escaped serious injury.

headline.main: 3 Are Injured When Horse Sheds Coach in Manhattan
headline.print_headline: 3 Are Injured When Horse Sheds Coach In Manhattan
